content.question: Assume that the initial values of  m  and  n  are the same in Code Segment 1 as they are in Code Segment 2. Which of the following correctly compares the number of times that  "*"  and  "@"  are printed when each code segment is executed?

choices.label: "*"  is printed  m  fewer times than  "@".
"*"  is printed  n  fewer times than  "@".
"*"  is printed  m  more times than  "@".
"*"  is printed  n  more times than  "@".

content.answer: "*"  is printed  m  more times than  "@".

skill.text: 3.A: Determine the result or output based on statement execution order in an algorithm.
